pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Local Gaussian Parameters // Computational routines for estimating local Gaussian parameters. Local Gaussian parameters are useful for characterizing and testing for non- linear dependence within bivariate data. See e.g. Tjostheim and Hufthammer, Local Gaussian correlation: A new measure of dependence, Journal of Econometrics, 2013, Volume 172 (1), pages 33-48 DOI:10.1016/j.jeconom.2012.08.001.
